remarks: Associative law for Hilbert space inner product.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hlipass.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hlipass.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
hlipass.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
hlipass $p |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A S B ) P C ) = ( A x. ( B P C ) ) ) $.
